metadata.title: CVE-2016-7168 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the media_handle_upload function in wp-admin/includes/media.php in WordPress before 4.6.1 might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by tricking an administrator into uploading an image file that has a crafted filename.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-7168` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.6.1+dfsg-1').
